name: Jane in the Jungle (GameBoy)
description:
Controls:

  • Enter - Start Game
  • Cursor Keys - Move Left/Right
  • Y/Z - Jump
  • X - Fire Dagger (if you have one)

Jane in the Jungle is a demake of one of my favourite MS-Dos Games "Jill of the Jungle". This is my first GB Studio project... had a lot of fun doing it despite all the limitations. This demo contains 2 levels and a bunch of mechanics from the original game.
